databases
Class CourseBase

java.lang.Object
  databases.CourseBase

public class CourseBase
extends java.lang.Object

CourseBase contains all valid read from databases. It uses the DatabaseReader to read the course from the databases.

Author:
Niels Thykier, Frederik Nordahl Sabroe, Morten SÃ¸rensen

          Reads and parses all the database files.

Constructor Detail

CourseBase

public CourseBase()
           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                  FilePermissionException
Constructs a new CourseBase that contains all valid courses.

Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the database files could not be found.
FilePermissionException - if the files could not be read due to missing permissions
Method Detail

reloadDatabase

private void reloadDatabase()
Used to (re-)load all the courses from the databases. The previous list of the Courses are voided, so only the courses in the databases at the time of reloading will appear in the CourseBase, when it is done.

getAmountOfCourses

public int getAmountOfCourses()
Get the amount of courses loaded (statistical data)

Returns:
The amount of courses that was loaded during the last reload.

getLoadAverage

public long getLoadAverage()
Get the load average for Courses per second (statistical data)

Returns:
The load average meassured in courses per second.

getLoadTime

public long getLoadTime()
Get the time it took to load the courses in the last load/reload. (statistical data)

Returns:
the time in milliseconds it took to do the last load/reload.

findCourse

public Course findCourse(java.lang.String courseID)
                  throws CourseDoesNotExistException
Look up a Course in the CourseBase by its ID.

Parameters:
courseID - The ID of the course to find.
Returns:
The Course with that given ID.
Throws:
CourseDoesNotExistException - Thrown if the course does not exist.

search

public Course[] search(java.lang.String pattern)
                throws CourseDoesNotExistException
Search through the database files for a course containing a pattern.

Parameters:
pattern - The pattern to search for.
Returns:
The Courses that match the pattern in some way.
Throws:
CourseDoesNotExistException

getAllCourses

public Course[] getAllCourses()
Get an array of all the courses in the CourseBase.

Returns:
All the courses in the CourseBase as a Array.

getStatisticalData

public java.lang.String getStatisticalData()
Get the statistical data about load times as a string.

Returns:
The Statistical Data from the last Database (re)load.

Prints a list of all the courses in the CourseBase.
